choose.when: INSERT INTO TBL_USER(ID, USER_NICKNAME, USER_SNS_LOGIN_STATUS, KAKAO_EMAIL, USER_PROFILE) VALUES(#{Id}, #{UserNickName}, #{UserSnsLoginStatus}, #{KakaoEmail}, #{UserProfile})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO TBL_USER(ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_SNS_LOGIN_STATUS, USER_NICKNAME) VALUES(#{Id}, #{UserEmail}, #{UserPassword}, #{UserName}, #{UserSnsLoginStatus}, #{UserNickName})
